## SEQUENTIAL\_PALETTES variable

Sequential color palettes for ordered data (light to dark). Useful for showing progression or magnitude.

**Signature:**

```typescript
SEQUENTIAL_PALETTES: {
    readonly blues: readonly ["#eff6ff", "#dbeafe", "#bfdbfe", "#93c5fd", "#60a5fa", "#3b82f6", "#2563eb", "#1d4ed8", "#1e40af"];
    readonly greens: readonly ["#f0fdf4", "#dcfce7", "#bbf7d0", "#86efac", "#4ade80", "#22c55e", "#16a34a", "#15803d", "#166534"];
    readonly purples: readonly ["#faf5ff", "#f3e8ff", "#e9d5ff", "#d8b4fe", "#c084fc", "#a855f7", "#9333ea", "#7e22ce", "#6b21a8"];
    readonly oranges: readonly ["#fff7ed", "#ffedd5", "#fed7aa", "#fdba74", "#fb923c", "#f97316", "#ea580c", "#c2410c", "#9a3412"];
}
```
